markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Limited">[Dancer](/NPCs.aspx?ID=939)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Dance can be used to tell stories, share emotions, provide entertainment, and display a performer's athletic ability. The dancer is a 5th-level challenge for dance contests.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 15

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Dancer](/NPCs.aspx?ID=939)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 236</row>

**Perception** +3

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +8, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +8, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +7, [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) +13, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +6, [Theater Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +5

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** +3

**Con** +1

**Int** +0

**Wis** +0

**Cha** +4
</row>

**Items**
[Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3) (3), jewelry and clothes

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 16 

**Fort** +6 

**Ref** +8 

**Will** +3 

</row>

**HP** 20

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +8 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+3 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
foot +8 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188)),
**Damage** 1d4+3 bludgeoning

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +8 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+3 piercing

**Fascinating Dance** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Frequency** once per round; **Effect** The dancer Strides up to their Speed. Once during this movement, when the dancer is adjacent to a creature, the dancer can make that creature attempt a DC 17 Will save. On a failure, that creature is [fascinated](/Conditions.aspx?ID=14) with the dancer until the end of its next turn.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-193" />
name: Dancer

Once during this movement, when the dancer is adjacent to a creature, the dancer can make that creature attempt a DC 17 Will save. On a failure, that creature is fascinated with the dancer until the end of its next turn.
